name: Battle Worlds: Kronos - Turn-based strategy revisited
blurb: You can help making an awesome new vision for classic turn-based strategy games become a reality!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Everybody at KING Art Games loves you! You don't get the game or any other listed reward. But you help to bring "Battle Worlds: Kronos" to life. Thank you for that!
DIGITAL BATTLEKIT - BASIC:\r\nGet the full digital version of the game, as well as access to the closed beta and instant access to the development forums.
DIGITAL EARLY BIRD:\r\nGet the DIGITAL BATTLEKIT - MAJOR EDITION with early bird pricing.
DIGITAL BATTLEKIT - MAJOR EDITION:\r\nYou'll get the digital version and all its perks PLUS an extended manual, a beautifully designed special weapon's manual and the soundtrack! (all digital)

COMMANDER'S BATTLEKIT (boxed)\r\nThis is it! The boxed version of the game, access to the closed beta and instant access to the development forum.\r\n(Please add $10 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $15 for rest of the world)
MAJOR EARLY BIRD:\r\nGet the BATTLEKIT - MAJOR EDITION with early bird pricing.\r\n(Please add $10 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $15 for rest of the world)

BONUS-REWARD: KING ART SCOUTING PACK (DIGITAL) \r\nIf you want to get to know what else we do, this is for you. This tier includes all that\u2019s in the DIGITAL BATTLEKIT \u2013 MAJOR EDITION plus a digital copy of THE BOOK OF UNWRITTEN TALES  or CRITTER CHRONICLES (either in English or German, your choice), delivered to you right after the campaign ends, so you have something to play until the beta of BW:K arrives.

BATTLEKIT - MAJOR EDITION:\r\nIncludes everything from the Boxed Edition PLUS the Battle Worlds card game, an extended manual with "Advanced Tactics" section and a beautifully designed weapon's manual (printed) as well as the soundtrack on CD.\r\n(Please add $10 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $15 for rest of the world)
BONUS REWARD: TAG TEAM PACK (DIGITAL)\r\nThere\u2019s no better team than you and your best buddy. Get yourselves a present by obtaining TWO DIGITAL BATTLEKIT \u2013 MAJOR EDITIONs with this tier.
SQUADLEADER KIT:\r\nDIGITAL ONLY: Get 4 digital copies of the game for you and your teammates, as well as all digital rewards of the Digital Battlekit \u2013 Major Edition. One for all, all for one!

MISSION COMMAND EDITION:\r\nIncludes everything from the MAJOR EDITION, but in a sturdy steel box, PLUS the Battle Worlds card game + special thanks in the credits (Commander's Section). More importantly, you will gain access to the CLOSED ALPHA.\r\n(Please add $15 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $20 for rest of the world)

BONUS REWARD: KING ART COMPLETE PACK (DIGITAL) \r\nYou want to get them all? Here\u2019s your chance! Get everything that\u2019s in the DIGITAL BATTLEKIT \u2013 MAJOR EDITION, and on top of that, EVERY major game we did: THE BOOK OF UNWRITTEN TALES, THE CRITTER CHRONICLES and even the yet unpublished THE RAVEN, all in one package!
DIGITAL ALPHA EARLY BIRD\r\nGet them while they\u2019re fresh: the early bird version of the 100$ Digital Alpha tier.

DIGITAL ALPHA EDITION - You get everything from the DIGITAL BATTLEKIT - MAJOR EDITION plus a special color for your units in multiplayer matches, an extra digital version of the game (to a total of 2), AND, most importantly, access to all ALPHA versions of the game, starting just a few weeks after the end of the Kickstarter campaign.

LIEUTENANT GENERAL EDITION:\r\nIncludes everything from the MISSION COMMAND EDITION, including special thanks in the credits (Lieutenant General\u2019s Section) and access to the closed alpha. As Lt. General, you will be also supplied with a signed "Thank You"-postcard and an awesome cap.\r\n(Please add $15 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $20 for rest of the world)

BONUS REWARD: KING ART COMPLETE ALPHA PACK (DIGITAL) \r\nYou want to get them all, but still want to have alpha access? Then step right in! Get everything that\u2019s in the DIGITA ALPHA EDITION, and on top of that, EVERY major game we did: THE BOOK OF UNWRITTEN TALES, THE CRITTER CHRONICLES and even the yet unpublished THE RAVEN, all in one package! Also, the Critter will record a personal greeting or answering machine message for you. Take notes, Veronica Mars, the Critter is just as beautiful and talkative and, well, possibly plushy, as Kristen Bell. (Kristen, if you read this, we love you!)

GENERAL EDITION:\r\nIncludes everything from the LIEUTENANT GENERAL EDITION, plus special thanks in the General's section of the credits, a cool Battle Worlds Key-Chain and a special color in multiplayer matches! As a general, you need a second in command, so we'll be providing you with one additional digital copy of the game (2 games in total).\r\n(Please add $15 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $20 for rest of the world)

CHAIRMAN OF THE JOINT CHIEFS EDITION:\r\nGet everything that is in the GENERAL EDITION, plus the quintessential military bag to carry your Battlekit around in! You will also get one more digital download to appoint another general at will (3 games in total).\r\n(Please add $15 for shipment if you are living in Europe, $20 for rest of the world)

EMPEROR EDITION:\r\nGet everything that is in the JOINT CHIEFS EDITION, plus a beautifully designed figurine (choose between the two models available), plus special thanks in the Emperor\u2019s section of the credits. You will also get one more digital download to appoint another general at will (4 games in total) and you give a unit-squad in the game its name (in coordination with us).

GALACTIC COUNCIL EDITION:\r\nIncludes everything from the EMPEROR Edition, but with BOTH figurines. Also, as a true leader, you will get the BattleWorlds RC helicopter to command at your will. You will also need more underlings. Hence, we will supply you with 1 additional (digital) versions of the game (to a total of 5).

DIGITAL MASTER EDITION - Get everything that is in the DIGITAL ALPHA EDITION, but with three extra-games (4 games in total). You can name something in the game (a unit, a country, a character) in coordination with us and get a pre-game credits entry! And... you'll play a match BW:K against one of the developers!

PLEDGE OF ALLEGIANCE:\r\nYou will be our Emperor for a while! Apart from all the cool stuff you will get (i.e. the full GALACTIC COUNCIL treatment), you can name something in the game (a unit, a country, a character) in coordination with us and get a pre-game credits entry! And... you'll play a match BW:K against one of the developers!

MASTER OF THE UNIVERSE:\r\nGet all rewards + Your character in the game: We will design a character after your likeness and name him/her after you. Also, we invite you to visit your troops at our office for an afternoon (travel & lodging not included), or pick our brains via Skype with people of choice from our executive team.

NOTCH-Edition:\r\nThanks Notch, we love you! Or maybe you aren't Notch? Then be like him! (All previous rewards, the coolest hat in the worlds, plus your name before anyone else\u2019s in the opening credits.)
